3. Banded Pass Through x 10 
4. Quadruped Thoracic Rotation x 5/side 
5. Yoga Pushup x 5
6. Squat to Shinbox Switch x 10/side
7. Squat Hip Rotations x 10 
8. Squat Thoracic Rotations x 5/side 
9. Cossack Squat x 5/side 
10. Long Split Squat x 30 sec/side 
11. Forward Fold with Rotation x 5/side
title: 20 minute Full Body Mobility

name: Persist Recover - Bodyweight Strength and Mobility Session

2. Wrist Flexion Stretch x 1 min 
3. Wrist Circles x 10 
4. Downdog to Updog x 5 
5. Prone Shoulder External Rotation x 5 with 5 sec hold. 
6. Prone Band Pass Through x 10 
7. Butterfly Stretch Fold x 10 
8. Crab Reach x 5/side

10. Half Kneeling Hip Flexor Stretch x 1 min/side 
11. Pancake Stretch x 1 min L, 1 min R, 1 min Center
12. Reclining Hero Pose x 1 min 
13. Reverse Nordics x 10
title: 30 minutes Full Body Mobility

name: Persist Recover - Bodyweight Strength and Mobility Session
info:
FBB Active Recovery: Ankles and Wrist Mobility 

There is a 20min Follow Along Mobility Video linked below. Coach Adam Fetter DPT will take you through a guided session to open up your hips and help you recover better this week. 

Below is the written script of this session should you care to follow some of the written cues.

1. Ankle Circles x 5 each direction
2. Weighted ankle stretch x 1 min/side
3. Heel Sit x 1 min
4. Toe Sit x 1 min
5. Hand to Hand wrist circles x 30 sec
6. Wrist Extension Stretch x 1 min
7. Wrist Flexion Stretch x 1 min
8. Wrist Isometrics x 3-5 reps with 5 sec hold
9. Quadruped Wrist Circles x 5-10 each direction
title: Ankles and Wrist Mobility

selected_exercises.name: FBB Active Recovery: Ankles and Wrists Mobility
